Play:
The Infant Pilgrim
(Keisei Awa no naruto / 傾城阿波の鳴門)

Written By: Chikamatsu Hanji (近松半二) , Yatami Heishichi (八民平七) , Terada Heizō (寺田兵蔵) , Takeda Bunkichi (竹田文吉) , Takemoto Saburobei (竹本三郎兵衛)

First Staged: 1768

Reference: The Pitiful EncounterKokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 146, December 1977; June 1985 Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

May 1969: The Infant Pilgrim

April 1972: The Infant Pilgrim

February 1973 Tour: The Infant Pilgrim

December 1977: The Infant Pilgrim

July 1980: The Infant Pilgrim

June 1985: The Infant Pilgrim

March 1988: The Infant Pilgrim

July 1977 Tour: The Infant Pilgrim

December 1993 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Infant Pilgrim

September 1997: The Infant Pilgrim

Characters:

Oyumi (Nyōbō Oyumi / 女房お弓)

Postman (Hikyaku / 飛脚)

Otsuru (Musume Otsuru / 娘おつる)

Jurobei (Awano Jūrobei / 阿波十郎兵衛)
